trans-unit.source: Contains information about an operation parameter.
trans-unit.target: 包含作業參數的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.OperationParameterInfo"></xref> class.

trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.OperationParameterInfo"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Represents the parameter name.
trans-unit.target: 表示參數名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the attributes of the associated operation parameter.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定關聯的作業參數的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.ParameterAttributes> of the associated operation parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.ParameterAttributes>相關聯的作業參數。</xref:System.Reflection.ParameterAttributes>

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Creates a shallow copy of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.OperationParameterInfo"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 建立的淺層複本<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.OperationParameterInfo"></xref>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The copy of the object.
trans-unit.target: 物件的複本。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two <xref:System.Object> instances are equal.
trans-unit.target: 判斷兩個<xref:System.Object>執行個體會相等。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to compare with the current object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>要與目前物件比較。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: if obj is equal, otherwise .
trans-unit.target: if obj is equal, otherwise .

trans-unit.source: Generates a number corresponding to the value of the object to support the use of a hash table.
trans-unit.target: 產生對應至物件的值數目，以支援雜湊資料表的使用。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> representing the hash code value of the object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Int32>代表物件的雜湊碼值。</xref:System.Int32>
